criterion: Provides a structured note format that includes all required sections: subjective, objective, vital signs, assessment, plan, labs, and follow-up.
Includes incorrect or missing information in the structured note, such as irrelevant or outdated medical data.
Fails to provide a structured note format that includes all required sections: subjective, objective, vital signs, assessment, plan, labs, and follow-up.
Does not provide a clear and understandable explanation for the structured note format.
Includes unnecessary or redundant information in the structured note.
Does not provide a structured note format that is easy to read and understand.
Provides a structured note format that includes all required sections, but with incorrect or missing information.
Provides a clear and understandable explanation for the structured note format.
Does not ask for clarification or additional information to improve the structured note.
Provides a structured note format that includes all required sections and is easy to read and understand.
